  • Accelerating Good Government Through Great Technology

    Work with Us

Part accelerator, part consultancy, EthosLabs is a new kind of company that helps governments and startups work together.

Work with Us

Building the GovTech Ecosystem

State and local governments in the US spend nearly $100B on technology every year; all the while, 99% of government technology projects fail, wasting taxpayer dollars and undermining crucuial service delivery.This has to change. And it's starting to.

A marketplace of new govtech startups is emerging, eager to change the way government works, using principles of the modern web: open, collaborative, and an ethos of constant improvement. Led by a team of experienced public servants and entrepreneurs, EthosLabs is a new company built to connect the dots between governments looking to do things differently, and startups ready to serve.

Connections

Talk to your peers, share your learnings and challenges, and avoid reinventing the wheel.

Visibility

Showcase your work to the broader community & build momentum for more success.

Consulting

Bring in outside expertise with a national perspective to build your innovation program or business.

Resources & Tools

Jumpstart your work by taking advantage of proven tools and resources from across the country.

For Entreprenuers

There are now hundreds of startups actively disrupting the $100B+ government technology ecosystem, working in thousands of jurisdictions, with the support of tens of millions of investment dollars. Yet — for those of us working in the field — we know that we have truly just scratched the surface. More support is needed to get to the next phase of govtech innovation: more sales traction for existing startups, more investments to help them grow, and more support and guidance as they reach scale in this new territory. That's what we offer at EthosLabs.

Get in touch

Expertise

Understanding of procurement and sales/marketing tactics for government

Connections

Shared rolodex of government parters and investors

Visibility

National recognition at conferences, through press, etc

For Governments

Government technology is often critized: failed, massive projects that get more headlines than users. But the blame can't be placed on the public servants at work, desparately trying to get the job done with broken tools and outdated policies. Indeed, it's often those people who are the most keen on changing the system -- and that's who we want to work with. Based on experience working with hundreds of govtech leaders, EthosLabs is here to help them (read: you) find a better, modern way.

Get in touch

Consulting

Through in-depth local analysis and national experiences, we help agencies adapt their processes, hire new personnel, and understand the options available.

Networking

We help you connect with agencies around common challenges and to common solutions, and highlight the work through the netwrok to boost momentum moving forward.

Reusable Apps/Solutions

We provide reusable templates, guides, and materials, ranging from sample contracts to open source code and policy, to lower the barrier to fully leveraging new tools and approaches.

Contact the Team

EthosLabs was founded by Abhi Nemani and Bob Sofman, both of whom have deep experience in the civic tech space: from co-leading a civic tech non-profit (Code for America), to leadership roles in government (Los Angeles, Sacramento) and civic startups (SmartProcure, GovDelivery). In their time at CfA, they created and ran CfA’s startup program and mentored 12 civic tech startups — all of which are still gaining traction and two of which have since been acquired. They also oversaw the deployment of civic technology in over 100 cities and hosted numerous events — including 4 CfA Summits — engaging key players throughout the civic tech landscape.

Use the form below to get in touch if you'd like to get involved.
